name: Project 2 - Vera Molnár
description: This project was inspired by Vera Molnár. The idea was to recreate the artwork and then make different variations of it, which included changing colors and shapes.

name: Project 2 - Blue sticks
description: This is a variation of project 2.

name: Project 2 - Pink dots
description: This is a variation of project 2.

name: Project 3 - A. Michael Noll
description: This project was inspired by A. Michael Noll and has been made with variation such as different color and shape.

name: Project 3 - Blue squares
description: This is a variation of project 2.

name: Project 3 - Pink and orange squares
description: This is a variation of project 2.

name: Vera Molnár - Animated lines
description: This work was inspired by Vera Molnár. The lines have instead been animated, using moving lines being drawn and made from a particle system.

name: Vera Molnár - Ice
description: A variation of the animated lines where a particle system is used to draw random lines (particles) from an emitter that is randomly spawned on the canvas.
